inputs.sentence: Historically, the uncertainty principle has been confused with a related effect in physics, called the observer effect, which notes that measurements of certain systems cannot be made without affecting the system, that is, without changing something in a system.

outputs.sentence: Historically, the uncertainty principle has been confused with a related effect in physics, called the observer effect, which notes that measurements of certain systems cannot be made without affecting the system, that is, without changing something in a system. The difference, in contrast, is that the uncertainty principle says that no amount of uncertainty in the measurement will affect the meaning

inputs.sentence: Trinity Medical Imaging is one of the foremost providers of private nuclear medicine imaging in London and Surrey. We work with someof the finest nuclear medicine consultants from a wide variety of specialist fields, attracted from London's major teaching hospitals.

outputs.sentence: Trinity Medical Imaging is one of the foremost providers of private nuclear medicine imaging in London and Surrey.
